Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

As tghe shield came at the ball in HEllpeons hand it was easily blasted away 
with a beam from his tail. Slowly Hellpeon lifts the ball into the air with 
one finger and smirked at Ultimo.

Hellpeon: "Thank you Ultimo for strengthening this attack at the moment but 
now im afraid our little game is over. See you at the IGL."

Hellpeon laughs evily as the ball floated away from him and half the distance 
between him and Ultimo before Hellpeon fire a beam of energy at it causing it 
to explode... The massive blast threatening to Engulf Hellpeon and 
Ultimo.((Whoo Infecticon energy void attack... evil thing sucks in all energy 
till it reached maximum and then turns it against all heh the beam bayonette 
just made the thing go into overload...))

--part1_8a.95c4aed.2881972a_boundary
